acceptOwnershipTransfer().details: accepts the ownership transfer. Final step of ownership transfer. This function can only be called by the newOwner that was confirmed in step 2. The contract should perform access control e.g., msg.sender == pendingOwner()

cancelPendingOwnershipTransfer().details: cancels the pending ownership transfer. Before the final step of ownership transfer (acceptOwnershipTransfer()). This function should wipe out the pendingOwner. By calling this function, ownership transfer process is canceled and should be reinitiated from initiateOwnershipTransfer().

confirmOwnershipTransfer(address).details: confirm the ownership transfer. Second step of ownership transfer. confirmation can only be done after the transfer-buffer period from initiation. newOwner should match with the initiation step's newOwner. To initiate ownership transfer to a different newOwner, initiation step should be re-conducted.

params.newOwner: the address of the new owner of the contract. stored as pendingOwner.

getOwnershipTransferBuffer().details: returns the ownership transfer buffer time (in seconds). the buffer is enforced between initiation <> confirmation of ownership transfer. the standard does not enforce the value range. it is highly recommended to be between 2 <> 14 days.

initiateOwnershipTransfer(address).details: initiate the ownership transfer. First step of ownership transfer. moves the newOwner to the preConfirmed stage.

params.newOwner: the address of the new owner of the contract. stored as preConfirmedOwner.

owner().details: returns the owner of the contract

pendingOwner().details: returns the pending owner of the account. pending owner should not have any authority/access/right.

preConfirmedOwner().details: returns the pre-confirmed owner of the account. pre-confirmed owner should not have any authority/access/right.

owner().notice: only the address returned by owner() has authority as the owner. pendingOwner() and preConfirmedOwner() should not possess any authority/access/right.
